013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;

019import java.util.*;

021import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
023
024/**
025 * Describes a single API operation on a path.
026 *
027 * <p>
028 * The Operation Object describes a single operation (such as GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) that can be performed on a path.
029 * Operations are the core of the API specification, defining what actions can be taken, what parameters they accept,
030 * and what responses they return.
031 *
032 * <h5 class='section'>OpenAPI Specification:</h5>
033 * <p>
034 * The Operation Object is composed of the following fields:
035 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
036 *    <li><c>tags</c> (array of string) - A list of tags for API documentation control
037 *    <li><c>summary</c> (string) - A short summary of what the operation does
038 *    <li><c>description</c> (string) - A verbose explanation of the operation behavior (CommonMark syntax may be used)
039 *    <li><c>externalDocs</c> ({@link ExternalDocumentation}) - Additional external documentation for this operation
040 *    <li><c>operationId</c> (string) - Unique string used to identify the operation
041 *    <li><c>parameters</c> (array of {@link Parameter}) - A list of parameters that are applicable for this operation
042 *    <li><c>requestBody</c> ({@link RequestBodyInfo}) - The request body applicable for this operation
043 *    <li><c>responses</c> (map of {@link Response}, REQUIRED) - The list of possible responses as they are returned from executing this operation
044 *    <li><c>callbacks</c> (map of {@link Callback}) - A map of possible out-of band callbacks related to the parent operation
045 *    <li><c>deprecated</c> (boolean) - Declares this operation to be deprecated
046 *    <li><c>security</c> (array of {@link SecurityRequirement}) - A declaration of which security mechanisms can be used for this operation
047 *    <li><c>servers</c> (array of {@link Server}) - An alternative server array to service this operation
048 * </ul>
049 *
050 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
051 * <p class='bjava'>
052 *    <jc>// Create an Operation object for a GET endpoint</jc>
053 *    Operation <jv>operation</jv> = <jk>new</jk> Operation()
054 *       .setTags(<js>"pet"</js>)
055 *       .setSummary(<js>"Find pets by status"</js>)
056 *       .setDescription(<js>"Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings"</js>)
057 *       .setOperationId(<js>"findPetsByStatus"</js>)
058 *       .setParameters(
059 *          <jk>new</jk> Parameter()
060 *             .setName(<js>"status"</js>)
061 *             .setIn(<js>"query"</js>)
062 *             .setDescription(<js>"Status values that need to be considered for filter"</js>)
063 *             .setRequired(<jk>true</jk>)
064 *             .setSchema(
065 *                <jk>new</jk> SchemaInfo().setType(<js>"string"</js>)
066 *             )
067 *       )
068 *       .setResponses(
069 *          JsonMap.<jsm>of</jsm>(
070 *             <js>"200"</js>, <jk>new</jk> Response()
071 *                .setDescription(<js>"successful operation"</js>)
072 *                .setContent(
073 *                   JsonMap.<jsm>of</jsm>(
074 *                      <js>"application/json"</js>, <jk>new</jk> MediaType()
075 *                         .setSchema(<jk>new</jk> SchemaInfo().<jsm>setType</jsm>(<js>"array"</js>))
076 *                   )
077 *                )
078 *          )
079 *       );
080 * </p>
081 *
082 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
083 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.0.0#operation-object">OpenAPI Specification &gt; Operation Object</a>
084 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/docs/specification/paths-and-operations/">OpenAPI Paths and Operations</a>
085 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanOpenApi3">juneau-bean-openapi-v3</a>
086 * </ul>
087 */
088@FluentSetters
089public class Operation extends OpenApiElement {
090
091   private List<String> tags;
092   private String summary, description, operationId;
093   private ExternalDocumentation externalDocs;
094   private List<Parameter> parameters;
095   private RequestBodyInfo requestBody;
096   private Map<String,Response> responses;
097   private Map<String,Callback> callbacks;
098   private Boolean deprecated;
099   private List<SecurityRequirement> security;
100   private List<Server> servers;
101
102   /**
103    * Default constructor.
104    */
105   public Operation() {}
106
107   /**
108    * Copy constructor.
109    *
110    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
111    */
112   public Operation(Operation copyFrom) {
113      super(copyFrom);
114      this.tags = copyOf(copyFrom.tags);
115      this.summary = copyFrom.summary;
116      this.description = copyFrom.description;
117      this.operationId = copyFrom.operationId;
118      this.externalDocs = copyFrom.externalDocs;
119      this.parameters = copyOf(copyFrom.parameters);
120      this.requestBody = copyFrom.requestBody;
121      this.responses = copyOf(copyFrom.responses);
122      this.callbacks = copyOf(copyFrom.callbacks);
123      this.deprecated = copyFrom.deprecated;
124      this.security = copyOf(copyFrom.security);
125      this.servers = copyOf(copyFrom.servers);
126   }
127

134      return tags;
135   }

144      this.tags = value;
145      return this;
146   }

155      setTags(listBuilder(String.class).sparse().add(value).build());
156      return this;
157   }

223   /**
224    * Bean property fluent setter:  <property>responses</property>.
225    *
226    * <p>
227    * The list of possible responses as they are returned from executing this operation.
228    *
229    * @param statusCode
230    *    The status code for the response.
231    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
232    * @param response
233    *    The response object.
234    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
235    * @return This object.
236    */
237   public Operation addResponse(String statusCode, Response response) {
238      assertArgNotNull("statusCode", statusCode);
239      assertArgNotNull("response", response);
240      responses = mapBuilder(responses).sparse().add(statusCode, response).build();
241      return this;
242   }
243
244   /**
245    * Bean property fluent setter:  <property>callbacks</property>.
246    *
247    * <p>
248    * A map of possible out-of band callbacks related to the parent operation.
249    *
250    * @param name
251    *    The name of the callback.
252    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
253    * @param callback
254    *    The callback object.
255    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
256    * @return This object.
257    */
258   public Operation addCallback(String name, Callback callback) {
259      assertArgNotNull("name", name);
260      assertArgNotNull("callback", callback);
261      callbacks = mapBuilder(callbacks).sparse().add(name, callback).build();
262      return this;
263   }

415      return parameters;
416   }
417
418   /**
419    * Returns the parameter with the specified type and name.
420    *
421    * @param in The parameter in.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
422    * @param name The parameter name.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
423    * @return The matching parameter, or <jk>null</jk> if not found.
424    */
425   public Parameter getParameter(String in, String name) {
426      assertArgNotNull("in", in);
427      assertArgNotNull("name", name);
428      if (parameters != null)
429         for (var p : parameters)
430            if (eq(p.getIn(), in) && eq(p.getName(), name))
431               return p;
432      return null;
433   }
434

442      this.parameters = value;
443      return this;
444   }

477   /**

479    *
480    * @return The responses map.
481    */
482   public Map<String,Response> getResponses() {
483      return responses;
484   }
485
486   /**
487    * Returns the response with the given status code.
488    *
489    * @param status The HTTP status code.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
490    * @return The response, or <jk>null</jk> if not found.
491    */
492   public Response getResponse(String status) {
493      assertArgNotNull("status", status);
494      return responses == null ? null : responses.get(status);
495   }
496
497   /**
498    * Returns the response with the given status code.
499    *
500    * @param status The HTTP status code.
501    * @return The response, or <jk>null</jk> if not found.
502    */
503   public Response getResponse(int status) {
504      return getResponse(String.valueOf(status));
505   }
506

629   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
630   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
631      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
632      return switch (property) {
633         case "tags" -> toType(getTags(), type);
634         case "summary" -> toType(getSummary(), type);
635         case "description" -> toType(getDescription(), type);
636         case "operationId" -> toType(getOperationId(), type);
637         case "externalDocs" -> toType(getExternalDocs(), type);
638         case "parameters" -> toType(getParameters(), type);
639         case "requestBody" -> toType(getRequestBody(), type);
640         case "responses" -> toType(getResponses(), type);
641         case "callbacks" -> toType(getCallbacks(), type);
642         case "deprecated" -> toType(getDeprecated(), type);
643         case "security" -> toType(getSecurity(), type);
644         case "servers" -> toType(getServers(), type);
645         default -> super.get(property, type);
646      };
647   }
648
649   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
650   public Operation set(String property, Object value) {
651      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
652      return switch (property) {
653         case "callbacks" -> setCallbacks(mapBuilder(String.class, Callback.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
654         case "deprecated" -> setDeprecated(toType(value, Boolean.class));
655         case "description" -> setDescription(Utils.s(value));
656         case "externalDocs" -> setExternalDocs(toType(value, ExternalDocumentation.class));
657         case "operationId" -> setOperationId(Utils.s(value));
658         case "parameters" -> setParameters(listBuilder(Parameter.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
659         case "requestBody" -> setRequestBody(toType(value, RequestBodyInfo.class));
660         case "responses" -> setResponses(mapBuilder(String.class, Response.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
661         case "security" -> setSecurity(listBuilder(SecurityRequirement.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
662         case "servers" -> setServers(listBuilder(Server.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
663         case "summary" -> setSummary(Utils.s(value));
664         case "tags" -> setTags(listBuilder(String.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
665         default -> {
666            super.set(property, value);
667            yield this;
668         }
669      };
670   }
671
672   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
673   public Set<String> keySet() {
674      var s = setBuilder(String.class)
675         .addIf(callbacks != null, "callbacks")
676         .addIf(deprecated != null, "deprecated")
677         .addIf(description != null, "description")
678         .addIf(externalDocs != null, "externalDocs")
679         .addIf(operationId != null, "operationId")
680         .addIf(parameters != null, "parameters")
681         .addIf(requestBody != null, "requestBody")
682         .addIf(responses != null, "responses")
683         .addIf(security != null, "security")
684         .addIf(servers != null, "servers")
685         .addIf(summary != null, "summary")
686         .addIf(tags != null, "tags")
687         .build();
688      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
689   }
